+public interface Accepted<T> {
+
+    /**
+     * Gets the accepted result of LRO.
+     *
+     * @return the accepted result
+     */
+    T getAcceptedResult();
+
+    /**
+     * Gets the {@link SyncPoller} of LRO.
+     *
+     * @return the sync poller.
+     */
+    SyncPoller<Void, T> getSyncPoller();
+
+    /**
+     * Gets the final result of LRO.
